summary: An ordinary foundry worker fakes a love story between him and the chambermaid from RMS Titanic. When ship sinks and chambermaid probably dies, his story gains popularity. But lie always has its price.
cast: Olivier Martinez|Romane Bohringer|Aitana Sánchez-Gijón|Didier Bezace|Aldo Maccione|Jean-Marie Juan|Arno Chevrier|Marianne Groves|Didier Bénureau|Alberto Cassadie|Giorgio Gobbi|Yves Verhoeven|Enzo De Caro|Salvador Madrid|Barbara Lerici|Stefania Orsola Garello|Maurizio Solda|Jim Adhi Limas
title: La camarera del Titanic
